loans.name: Chadzumbe

texts.en:
Chadzumbe is a married woman with four children. All of her kids attend school which is the reason for her hard work.  She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She has operated a kiosk business from home for the past one year, selling to passersby and neighbours. She cited seasonality and theft as her challenges in the business. 

With the Kshs 30,000 she wants to purchase maize flour, wheat flour, sugar, detergents, and rice. Her dream is to see her children get better education and become important people in society.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, wheat flour, sugar, detergents, and rice.

loans.name: Mahammed

texts.en:
Mahammed is 55 years old and married. A new client, Mahammed is a cattle trader in the  Sabirabad region, where he has been for the last 12 years. He works hard in his business four days a week. He also has a café, which is his other source of income. He opens the café  when he is not working in the cattle trade business. 

Mahammed started his cattle business in 2001 because he thought it would reward him with big profits, which he would use to uplift the status of his family. He would like to buy more cows to make more profit and better cater to his family's needs. He hopes to expand the business and to use his profits to buy more cattle in future. Mahammed awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy more cows

loans.name: Hanifa

texts.ru: Ханифа добродушная женщина. Она вдова и имеет 3 детей. Несмотря на свой возраст,Ханифа является основной кормилицей семьи, так как ее сын инвалид и получает маленькую пенсию. Ханифа более 20 лет занимается бизнесом. Она начала свой бизнес после смерти мужа, так как она нуждалась в деньгах. Ханифа продает женскую обувь. Она торгует на местном рынке. Ханифа трудится упорно для того, чтобы получить больше дохода. Она должна обновить товар на осенний сезон, но не имеет достаточно денег для этого. Ханифа запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки обуви для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Hanifa is a good-natured woman. She is a widow and has three children. Despite her age, Hanifa is the main breadwinner for the family, since her son is disabled and receives a small pension. For more than 20 years, Hanifa has been running a business. She began her business after the death of her husband since she needed money. Hanifa sells women's footwear. She trades in the local market. 

Hanifa works hard in order to receive more income. She must update her inventory for the fall season, but does not have money for this. Hanifa is requesting a loan of 2,000 somoni to purchase shoes for the new season.

loans.use: to buy shoes for the new season

loans.name: Yanina Verónica

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Mujeres Progresistas se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente. 
En este lugar vive la señora Yanina, tiene 26 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos 10, 9, 6 y 5 años de edad, todos  estudian en escuela. Su esposo es conserje en una empresa privada.
Doña Yanina con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su casa  hasta  donde llegan sus clientes cuando necesitan una prenda, trabaja todos los días en las mañanas ya que aprovecha que a esta hora sus hijos están en la escuela para realizar sus recorridos, ella deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Tiene más de 3 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual se ayuda para pagar los estudios de sus hijos que para ella es lo más importante.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Lleva más de 7 años en el Banco Comunal  y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos. Sus sueños son que sus hijos tengan una buena educación.
texts.en:
The communal bank Mujeres Progresistas meets every two weeks in Jipijapa canton, an area named for the coffee sultan and known for its extensive coffee farms, which produce the most flavorful coffee, for its cuisine, and for its kind residents. Yanina, 26, lives here. She is married and has four children, ages 10, 9, 6, and 5, who are in school. Her husband is a janitor for a private company.

Yanina started selling clothing door-to-door and from her house, where her customers come when they need to buy clothes, to earn money herself and be able to help her husband pay household expenses. She works every day in the morning to take advantage of the time when her children are in school. She offers her customers credit terms and collects every two weeks. She has been working at this job for three years so that she could help pay for her children's education, which is very important to her. 

She will use this loan to buy merchandise such as pants, blouses, shirts, and children's clothing. She has been a member of the communal bank for seven years and likes the funding the bank offers. She dreams of giving her children a good education.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, shirts, and children's clothing.

loans.name: July Angelica

texts.es:
July es una mujer de 22 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus padres y hermanos, ella es muy trabajadora, entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres July pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Farmacia.
Por iniciativa propia, July trabaja como asistente en una farmacia medica de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y buen desempeño.
July se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizará el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea reforzar el techado y ponerle piso a su hogar, de esta manera ella y su familia tendrán mayor seguridad y bienestar, así pues July seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia casa.
texts.en:
July is a 22-year-old woman. She is single and lives in the city of Pucallpa with her parents and siblings. She is very hard-working and enthusiastic, and she has a great desire to get ahead in life. Thanks to her effort and the support of her parents, July was able to study for a professional degree in Pharmacy. 

On her own initiative, July works as an assistant in a medical pharmacy in her city. She works every day for approximately 10 hours, and she believes that it is going well for her because of her dedication and excellent performance. 

July is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help provided she will carry out improvements to her home. She wants to reinforce the roof and lay a floor in her home. In this way she and her family will have improved security and well-being. Thus July will continue working and striving to achieve her greatest dream: to have a house of her own.

loans.use: to improve her home.

loans.name: Tamara

texts.ru: Тамаре 41 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 7 детей. У Тамары среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Тамара занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Тамары, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 1 теленок, 32 овцы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). Тамара входит в группу "Тамара", в эту группу входят еще 2 человека. Тамара является лидером группы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Тамара обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Тамара планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку семейной автомашины.
texts.en:
Tamara is 41 years old, married, and together with her husband is raising seven children. Tamara has a high school education. As a main source of income for her family, Tamara is involved in raising livestock, having started 20 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 10,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Tamara currently has on her homestead: three dairy cows, one calf, and 32 sheep. Monthly income consists of 5,000 som (KGS). Tamara is the group leader of the borrower group "Tamara" which consists of two other people.

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Tamara turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy calves for increasing the count of cattle.

Tamara plans to invest income from the loan in further increasing the quantity of domestic animals, and plans to save money to buy a family automobile.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Gilma Elizabeth

texts.es:
Gilma, tiene 37 años está acompañada, vive con su compañero de vida y sus cuatro hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la siembra de granos básico (frijol y maíz),oficio que aprendió de sus padres pero que cuando se acompañó empezó hacerlo de forma independiente, trabaja de lunes a sábado de 6:00 a.m. a 12: 00p.m. Hasta la fecha no ha tenido ningún problema que el impida realizar dicha actividad.
 Está solicitando un crédito para comprar abono, fertilizantes, herbicidas y semilla con los cuales tendrá los insumos necesarios para preparar la tierra y sembrar, espera mejorar sus ingresos, obtener una cosecha abundante.
Ella desea sacar adelante a sus hijos, poder pagarles una buena educación superior, ampliar el negocio y cancelar la deuda.
texts.en:
Gilma, 37, lives with her life partner and four children in their own house. She plants basic grains (beans and corn), a trade she learned from her parents. Now that she has a partner, she works her own land Mondays to Saturdays from 6:00 a.m. until 12:00 p.m. She has been working without any obstacles until now.

She has applied for a loan to buy manure, fertilizer, weed killer, and seed, which she needs to prepare the land and plant. She hopes to increase her earnings and produce an abundant harvest. She wants to provide for her children, be able to pay for a good education for them, grow her business, and pay off her loan.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, weed killer, and seed.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is 41 years old and married. She has four children, three of whom are still in school.

Fe is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional livestock for her business. She has been raising livestock for 10 years now and has borrowed from NWTF 14 times in the past to sustain it.

In the future, Fe would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock for her business

loans.name: Dimitri

texts.en:
Dimitri is 59-year old, married man. He lives with his wife, son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren in a small village of Khulo district. His daughter-in-law works at a local school and gets a monthly salary. Dimitri is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, he has three cows, whose milk is used in cheese products. His wife milks the cows every day and produces cheese to sell. In addition, Dimitri owns a small agricultural plot, where maize and different types of fruits are grown. He is a very hard-working man and always has high quality produce which is sold locally. 

Dimitri decided to start his own business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables him to get a loan of $5000 for purchasing a minibus. When the minibus is purchased, he will start working on the minibus line and transport people to generate income. With the increased income he will improve living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a minibus

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru: Рано пережила трудные тягости жизни. Она вдова. После смерти мужа она осталась без кормильца с 3 детьми. Рано имеет среднее образование. Она живет в сельской местности и поэтому как другие местные жители занимается скотоводством. Она занимается этим бизнесом более 10 лет. Рано начала свой бизнес купле продажей мясных изделий. Постепенно она развевала бизнес и сама начала откармливать скота. Данное время она имеет 4 голов крупно -рогатого скота. Она уже имеет большой опыт и с легкостью справляется с бизнесом. Рано хочет расширить бизнес. Она должна увеличить оборотный капитал, но не имеет достаточно денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Rano has endured difficult hardships in her life. She is a widow. After the death of her husband, she was left without a breadwinner with three children. Rano has a high school education. She lives in a rural area and therefore like other local residents is engaged in raising livestock. She has been involved in this business for more than ten years. Rano began his business buying and selling meat products. Gradually, she developed her business and started fattening cattle on her own.

Currently, she has four head of cattle. She already has a lot of experience and can easily handle the business. Rano wants to expand her business. She must increase her working capital, but does not have enough money. She is requesting a loan of 1,000 somoni to purchase cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle for increasing her working capital

loans.name: Marielisa Viviana

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Mujeres Progresistas se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente. 
En este lugar vive la señora Marielisa, tiene 35 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 11 y 2  años de edad, el mayor  estudia en escuela. Su esposo es mecánico automotriz.
Doña Marielisa para ganarse algo por su cuenta y así no tener que depender de su esposo para sus gastos, desde hace más de 5 años decidió poner un negocio en su casa de venta de lubricantes y accesorios para vehículos, a ella le ha ido muy bien ya que que el taller de su esposo está al lado de su negocio y sus ventas están aseguradas ya que los clientes de sus esposo le compran a ella cuando necesitan una pieza o un lubricante. Así ella se gana algo sin salir de casa y sin tener que descuidar a sus hijos y su hogar.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más lubricantes y ciertos accesorios para vehiculos que necesita. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 4 años  y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho para  mejorar su negocio. Su sueño es tener un carro.
texts.en:
The communal bank Mujeres Progresistas meets every two weeks in Jipijapa canton, an area named for the coffee sultan and known for its extensive coffee farms, which produce the most flavorful coffee, for its cuisine, and for its kind residents. Marielisa, 35, lives here. She is married and has two children, ages 11 and 2. The oldest child is a student, and her husband is an auto mechanic.

Five years ago, Marielisa opened a business, selling lubricants and accessories for vehicles, in her house to earn her own income and not depend on her husband to pay expenses. The business is doing well because her husband's workshop is next to her business, and sales are assured because her husband's customers buy from her when they need a part or lubricant. She is able to earn something without leaving home and without neglecting her children and the house. 

She will use this loan to buy more lubricants and some vehicle accessories that she needs. She has belonged to the communal bank for four years and likes that the funding helps her to grow her business. She dreams of owning a car.

loans.use: to buy lubricants and accessories for vehicles.

loans.name: Blanca Leonor

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Mujeres Progresistas se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente. 
En este lugar vive la señora Blanca, tiene 49 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos, tres de ellos  mayores de edad y la menor tiene 13 años, dos de sus hijos estudian uno en universidad y la menor en colegio, todos sus hijos aun vive con ella. Su esposo es mecánico.
Doña Blanca tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa,  allí vende todo tipo de víveres como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras, frutas, carnes, queso, entre otras cosas, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 21h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos le ayudan de vez en cuando aunque la mayor parte del tiempo es ella quien está en su negocio, ya que allí se distrae y también gana su dinero sin salir de su casa.  Lleva 7 años con su negocio y lo empezó con el primer crédito que recibió del banco comunal.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros artículos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 7 años y le gusta porque con los créditos empezó su negocio y esto ha mejorado mucho su vida. Sus sueños seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The communal bank Mujeres Progresistas meets every two weeks in Jipijapa canton, an area named for the coffee sultan and known for its extensive coffee farms, which produce the most flavorful coffee, for its cuisine, and for its kind residents. Blanca, 49, lives here. She is married and has four children, three of whom are grown and the youngest is 13. Two of her children are in college, one child is in high school, and all of them live with her. Her husband is a mechanic.

Blanca has a grocery shop in her house, where she sells all kinds of household items such as rice, sugar, oils, detergent, grains, vegetables, fruit, meat, and cheese. She works every day from 6:00 a.m. until 11:00 p.m. or later. Sometimes her children help out, though usually she attends the business because it occupies her time and she earns money without leaving the house. She started the business seven years ago with her first communal bank loan.

She will use this loan to buy inventory such as rice, sugar, oil, and other basic items. She has been a member of the communal bank for seven years and likes the bank because it provided the loans to start her business, which has improved her life a lot. She dreams of going forward.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, and other basic items.

loans.name: Marcel

texts.en:
This is Marcel, 32, resident of Cabrera, Pasay, Philippines. She is married and she has children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Marcel operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

She is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Marcel dreams to expand her business and hopes to have a food stall for additional income.  She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Vasif

texts.en:
Vasif is a 50 year old married man who has loved animal husbandry since childhood. He was at a young age when his father was raising cattle. That seemed to him very natural. 
Vasif also raises onions. He works hard, but his income is small and it is not enough to buy cattle and increase his working capital. Now he is asking for the loan 1500 AZN to increase his working capital. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy cattle and increase his working capital

loans.name: Ehtiram

texts.en:
Ehtiram is 53 years old and married. He is bringing up three sons. Like any loving father, Ehtiram wants his children to get an education and to become self-sufficient. He is doing his best to provide for them and to give them an education. For about two years, he has been involved in raising animals. Previously, such a thing was for him only a hobby, but now it has become a real profession. At the same time he runs a meat shop. His monthly income from this business is 200 AZN.

Now, Ehtiram is requesting a loan of 2,000 AZN to buy small calves. In this way, he wants to increase his cattle count and to expand his activities.

loans.use: to buy small calves

loans.name: Estrella De Belen Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal estrella de belén está conformado por 10 integrantes nueve mujeres un hombre, madres y padres responsables con 15 hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarios de Malpaisillo lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Se caracterizan por ser trabajadores, responsables con ganas de superación personal. Lamentablemente no pudieron estudiar y se vieron obligadas a trabajar desde temprana edad por falta de recursos económicos. Y luchan día a día para brindarles un futuro mejor  a sus hijos.  

Gracia a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora es  Corina y tiene por actividad económica la elaboración y venta de tortillas, negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación. Ella dedica a su negocio unas 8 horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. La rutina de trabajo es lavanterse a las 4: 00 am para nixquezar, moler, y elaborar las tortillas. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta materia prima para la elaboración de las tortillas como maíz, cal, leña, gas, bolsas plasticas. Para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. El banco comunal Estrella de Belén agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The Estrella de Belén Communal Bank is made up of ten members, nine women and one man, responsible mothers and fathers with 15 children under their care.  They are from Malpaisillo, which is located in the western region of the country.  They are known for being hardworking, responsible, and driven to better themselves personally.  Unfortunately, they were not able to go to school and instead had to work from a young age because of a lack of financial resources.  They also work day after day to offer their children a better future. 

Corina is the coordinator, thanks to her hard work and drive to get ahead.  Her business is making and selling tortillas and it is located in her home.  She spends eight hours a day selling her product.  Her work routine is to get up at 4:00 am to prepare the corn, grind, and make her tortillas.  Her goal for this loan is to invest in working capital and to stock her business buying and selling raw material for making tortillas, such as corn, lime, firewood, gas, and plastic bags.  This is so her profits will be better in the near future.  The Estrella de Belén Communal Bank is thankful for the help Kiva's lenders offer to people with few resources in poor countries like Nicaragua so they can do respectable work.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and buy raw material to make tortillas, such as corn, lime, firewood, gas, plastic bags.

loans.name: Ulmasoy

texts.ru: Улмасой является мастером своего дела.  Она опытная портниха и создает шедевры таджикских национальных платьев. Ей 33 года. Она не замужем и не имеет детей. Она живет вместе со своими родителями. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 5  лет назад она начала свой бизнес. Она предоставляет свои услуги дома. Благодаря  хорошему сервису, она обладает широким кругом клиентов. Улмасой использует свои деньги для покупки продуктов питания для проживания. Улмасой и ее семья живут в старом и маленьком домике, который не отвечает стандартам жилья. Она хочет отремонтировать свой дом. Улмасой не имеет достаточно денег, чтобы купить строительные материалы и отремонтировать дом. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони. Она надеется на вас и вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Ulmasoy is a master of her trade. She is an experienced dressmaker and creates masterpieces of Tajik national dress. She is 33 years old. She is not married and does not have children. She lives with her parents. With the aim of providing the family with all the necessities, she started her own business five years ago. She offers her services from her home. Thanks to good service, she has a wide circle of customers. Ulmasoy uses her money to buy groceries for living.

Ulmasoy and her family lives in an old and small home that does not meet living standards. She wants to make repairs on their home. Ulmasoy does not have enough money to buy constrution materials and to repair her home.

She is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni.

loans.use: to buy building materials for repairing her house

loans.name: Guzal

texts.ru: Гузал несмотря на свою молодость упорно трудится и старается помочь своим родителям по обеспечению семьи. Ей 24 года. Она не замужем и не имеет детей. Гузал после окончания средней школы не смогла поступить в университет, так как она из бедной семьи. Она всегда мечтала получить высшее образование, так как она училась в средней школе отлично. Таким образом, после окончания средней школы она начала свой бизнес скотоводством. Гузал занимается этим бизнесом уже 4 года. Она постепенно развевает свои навыки по введению бизнеса. Ее мать и брат помогают ей по введению бизнеса. С полученного дохода она недавно построила большой коровник. Она теперь хочет увеличить свой оборотный капитал. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки крупно – рогатого скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Guzal, despite her youth, works hard and tries to help her parents to support the family. She is 24 years old. She is not married and does not have children. After graduating from high school, Guzal was not able to go to college since she us from a poor family. She always dreamed of receiving a higher education since she was an excellent student. Accordingly, after graduation she started her own business raising livestock. Guzal has been involved in this business already for four years. She is gradually developing her skills for running a business. Her mother and brother help her in managing the business. With the earned income, she recently built a large cowshed. She now wants to increase her working capital. She is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle for increasing her working capital

loans.name: Tseren-Ool

texts.en:
Mr. Tseren-Ool is 52 years old and lives with his wife and two children in a Ger, a traditional nomadic tent, in Uvs province of Mongolia. His wife works at a local cafeteria as a chef and his two children both are university students. 

Tseren-Ool used to craft traditional horse saddles and other horse riding equipment with cow leather and started producing traditional boots manufactured at home by orders. He is a very talented craftsman with good taste. He is now requesting a loan of 500,000 MNT to purchase materials and inventories to meet clients' orders on time. He dreams about expanding his business and teaching others how to make traditional boots, saddles, etc.

loans.use: to purchase materials and inventories to meet clients' orders on time

loans.name: Rosa Danny

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Mujeres Progresistas se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente. 
En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen una hija la misma que ya es una profesional. Su esposo trabaja en una universidad de la localidad.
Doña Rosa tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa,  allí vende todo tipo de víveres como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras, frutas, carnes, además de esto allí sus clientes también pueden encontrar cierto artículos de bazar, medicinas y útiles escolares, a ella le gusta tener de todo un poco para que sus clientes no compren en otro lugar,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su hija y su esposo le ayudan en su trabajo cuando están desocupados, lleva más de 16 años con su negocio con el cual está muy contenta.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otras cosas. Está en el Banco Comunal 6 años y le gusta porque ha hecho muchas amigas en el grupo. Sus sueños son ir mejorando su negocio cada día más.
texts.en:
The communal bank Mujeres Progresistas meets every two weeks in Jipijapa canton, an area named for the coffee sultan and known for its extensive coffee farms, which produce the most flavorful coffee, for its cuisine, and for its kind residents. Rosa, 52, lives here. She is married and has a daughter who has a career. Her husband works for a local university.

Rosa has a grocery shop in her house, where she sells all kinds of products such as rice, sugar, oil, detergents, grains, vegetables, fruit, meats, bazaar items, medicine, and school supplies. She likes stocking a lot of variety so that her customers don't shop elsewhere. She works every day form 6:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. or later. Her daughter and her husband help when they are not busy. She has run her business for 16 years and is very happy.  

She will use this loan to stock her shop with rice, sugar, oil, and more. She has been a member of the communal bank for six years and is happy to have made friends with the other members. She dreams of making her business better each day.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, etc.

loans.name: Meloween

texts.en: Meloween and her husband live in a rural community.They help each other in cultivating their farm land by planting corn to sell. Meloween plans to expand their plantation of corn crops in order to increase their production. But due to a shortage of capital, she decided to ask for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy fertilizers and herbicides needed in her corn production. She knows that through this financial support, she will be able to improve her farming business, which enables her to obtain greater income for her family's future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and herbicides needed in corn production

loans.name: Felecisima

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Felecisima works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell dried fish business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising goats and selling bananas. Felecisima is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy additional boxes of dried fish to sell.

Felecisima has been sustaining her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fruit vending business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more fruits to sell to her customers for her fruit vending business.

Gloria has been in this business for five years. She earns more income from food vending.

Gloria has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fruits to sell to her customers

loans.name: Qurbaneli

texts.en: Qurbaneli is a 55-year-old married person who is raising two children together with his wife. He is a cattle breeder with more than 15 years of experience. He purchases small calves and then fattens and raises them. After six months, he resells the grown cattle in the central city market. He applied for a 1500 AZN loan to purchase more cattle and increase his income. This loan will allow him to improve the life of his family. This is going to be his first loan.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle and increase his income

loans.name: Vuthy

texts.en:
Vuthy is 48 years old. He is married and lives with his 12-year-old child in Takeo Province, Cambodia. He has been breeding pigs and poultry for more than three years, earning approximately $3 per day. His wife is a tailor who earns an income of $5 daily. 

To improve his business, Vuthy is requesting a loan of $300 to purchase fodder for breeding pigs and poultry. This money will help him feed his animals well. In the future, he would like to expand his business and send his child to a good school. Moreover, he hopes to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase fodder for breeding pigs and poultry.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: Jorge Luis, es un señor responsable que se preocupa por salir adelante junto a su familia, labora como taxista largas horas durante su turno en la noche, lo que hace algunas veces peligroso su trabajo; con sus ingresos  cubre las necesidades básicas de sus dos hijos, de las edades de 16 años y una de 4 meses de vida, sus deseos es verlos realizadas como unos verdaderos profesionales y con oportunidades diferentes de empleo, lo que el no  pudo tener. Jorge Luis solicita el crédito para invertirlo en su unidad de taxi, al que constantemente tiene que estarle invirtiendo, esto debido al mal estado de las calles de Managua, las cuales no prestan buenas condiciones y deterioran el vehículo, su necesidad es invertir para poder continuar trabajando y mantener los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en: Jorge Luis is a responsible man who is concerned with getting ahead together with his family. He works long hours as a taxi driver during the night shift, which makes his work dangerous at times. With his income he covers the basic needs of his two children, one of whom is 16 years old and the other just 4 months of age. His desire is to see them become true professionals with a range of work opportunities that he was not able to have. Jorge Luis is requesting the loan to invest in his taxi unit. He is constantly having to invest money in it, because of the bad state of the roads in Managua, which do not provide good conditions for his vehicle, causing it to deteriorate. He needs to invest so that he can continue working and covering his household expenses.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for his taxi's steering assembly.

loans.name: Tsagaanhuu

texts.en:
Mrs.Tsagaanhuu is 57 years old and lives with her husband in their ger, which is a traditional nomadic tent, in the Uvs province of Mongolia. Her five children have graduated from school and are living by themselves. Her husband, Gansuh, receives a pension from the government for his disability. 

Tsagaanhuu has been serving local residents by selling a variety of clothing from her rental booth at the local market. She is a hardworking and enthusiastic woman who is now requesting 2,500,000 MNT to purchase winter clothing from Erlian, China, to sell from her rental booth.

loans.use: to purchase winter clothing from Erlian, China, to sell from her rental booth.

loans.name: Lucita Aurora

texts.es:
Lucita Aurora tiene 56 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo, en el distrito de Colasay, una comunidad que se caracteriza por hermosos paisajes verdes, su población se dedica al cultivo de pasto para alimento de la ganadería, comercio de los mismos y agricultura, que pertenece a Pucará a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, sierra norte del Perú.

Junto a su hijo se dedican desde hace 5 años a la elaboración de compost, abono orgánico que utilizan para fortalecer a las plantas, su negocio está ubicado en un terreno cerca a su domicilio, así mismo venden plantones de café y árboles.

Ella ha solicitado un préstamo de 4 000 nuevos soles para la compra de insumos roca fosfórica, guano de isla para acelerar la elaboración de compost y de esta manera tener mayor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lucita Aurora is 56 years old and lives with her son in the Colasay district of Pucará, which is 2 hours away from the city of Jaén in the northern mountains of Peru.  The community is known for its beautiful green landscapes, and the residents primarily work growing pastures for grazing, selling livestock and in agriculture.

Along with her son, for the past 5 years, she has worked making compost, an organic fertilizer used to strengthen plants.  Her business is located on a plot near her home.  They also sell coffee plants and trees.

She is requesting a loan for 4,000 nuevos soles to purchase supplies such as: phosphoric rock and guano to accelerate the composting process.  With this, she will increase her production to offer her customers, generating more income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase supplies such as: phosphoric rock and guano for composting.

loans.name: Evelin Mercedes

texts.es:
Evelin Mercedes tiene 22 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en la zona rural de Nueva Arica, una comunidad donde su población se dedica a la agricultura y comercio de animales menores, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral patos, pollos, chivos y cerdos, nos explica que esta actividad lo realiza desde que se caso y de esta manera contribuye con su esposo en los gastos de su hogar.

Mechita como a si la conocen en su comunidad ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde y así tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Evelin Mercedes is 22 years old and lives with her husband and their children in a rural area in Nueva Arica, which is a community where the population works in agriculture and small animal sales.  Two hours away is the city of Chiclayo, which is on the north coast of Peru.

She raises and sells animals such as farmyard ducks, chickens, goats, and pigs.  She tells us that she began doing this work after she got married and this is how she contributes with her husband to the household expenses.

She is known as "Mechita" in the community, and she is seeking a loan of 1000 nuevos soles so that she can buy balanced food in order to fatten up the animals.  She will then have better products to offer her customers, which will generate a higher income for her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced food in order to fatten up her small animals.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her that let her buy more products for her variety store. She has had this store for twenty years now. Her loan also helped with the education of her children. Her income from the business supported their everyday household expenses. 
 
She would like to apply for another 40,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add in her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from the business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Marilyn hopes to have a grocery store and dreams of giving her children a good life and education. She meets up with her co-fellowship members* weekly to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed for her business.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en: Betty is a mother who runs a small variety store to help her husband in generating income. She is aiming to improve the business she has and make it profitable someday. For this reason, she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy more stocks of canned goods, beverages, noodles, snack foods, candies, laundry soaps, and seasonings to sell in her store. By having this additional capital, she could also increase her income which enables her to support the education of her child and satisfy her family's basic necessities. She is hoping that this loan will help to make improvements in her variety store business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of canned goods, beverages, noodles, snack foods, candies, laundry soaps, and seasonings to sell.

loans.name: Tsetsegmaa

texts.en:
Tsetsegmaa is 43 years old and lives with her husband and a daughter in their ger, a traditional nomadic tent house, in Uvs province, Mongolia. Her husband works at a local construction company and her daughter is a local secondary school student.
Tsetsegmaa has been producing traditional leather boots by order since 2010 and has a lot of experience and regular clients. She has received lots of orders lately for winter boots and is now requesting a loan of 1,050,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of materials to meet orders on time. She is a hardworking and modest woman.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of materials to meet orders on time

loans.name: Iluminada

texts.en:
Iluminada is a married woman with nine children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Iluminada is 59 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Iluminada has a food vending business in the Philippines. Iluminada requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Iluminada has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Iluminada would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a married man with four children who are all in school. He has been in the goat rearing business since 1997 in order to raise income to meet the needs of his family. His first two children have entered a secondary school. He therefore wants money to pay tuition without interrupting his goat business. He will then later sell his goats when they are well matured and get increased profits.

loans.use: To pay tuition

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino, age 38, lives with her 8-year-old daughter and husband in the town of Rustavi. Nino works as a hired salesperson at the grocery store and earns a monthly salary. Her husband is employed at the local factory in return for a modest monthly income as well. Their salaries are hardly enough to cover the cost of food and daily expenses.   

In order to generate more income, Nino has decided to start her own grocery store. However, she does not have enough money to do so. Unfortunately, Nino was unable to obtain a loan from the existing financial institutions since they require business experience and a stable income as preconditions for a loan. 

However, Nino has now received her loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. This start-up loan program provides start-up loans with easy terms to the vulnerable poor who do not have access to credit products. With a loan of $2,000, Nino will purchase stock of basic groceries such as sugar, pasta, oil, soft drinks, etc. to start a store. She will work as a salesperson and serve her clients in a friendly way. Nino is a very determined lady and hopes her project will be lucrative. She awaits your generosity.

loans.use: to purchase stock of basic groceries such as sugar, pasta, oil, soft drinks, etc. to start a store.

loans.name: Ne'matullo

texts.ru:
Неъматулло целеустремленный, жизнерадостный и веселый молодой человек, таким его знают его родные, друзья и соседи. Ему 26 лет. Он не женат и живет с родителями и четырьмя сестрами в районе Вахш. Неъматулло любит и дорожит своей семьей. Он планирует в скором времени жениться и привести свою жену в родительский дом и принять в свою семью.
   На данный момент Неъматулло занимается куплей и продажей крупнорогатого скота. Он начал данную деятельность около четырех лет назад. Ему помогает его отец, который до не давних пор сам занимался скотоводством. 
   Неъматулло нуждается в кредите. Он собирается купить два теленка. Неъматулло считает, что этот закуп поможет ему увеличить количество скотов и его бизнес расширится. Желаем Неъматулло успеха в его деятельности.
texts.en:
Ne'matullo's family, friends and neighbors know him to be a purposeful, cheerful, and happy young man. He is 26 years old. He is single and lives with his parents and four sisters in Vakhsh. Ne'matullo loves and cherishes his family. He plans to marry soon and bring his wife to his parents' house to become part of the family. 

Currently Ne'matullo works buying and selling cattle. He began this work about four years ago. He is assisted by his father, who until recently also worked in animal husbandry. Ne'matullo needs a loan. He's going to buy two calves. 

Ne'matullo believes that this purchase will help him increase the number of cattle he has and expand his business. We wish Ne'matullo success in his work.

loans.use: buy two calves.

loans.name: Wilder

texts.es:
Wilder tiene 31 años de edad, vive junto a su madre en el distrito de Cayaltí, donde su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, comercio de animales menores y transporte, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Hace 3 años se dedica al servicio de transporte en su propia mototaxi llevando pasajeros a las comunidades aledañas a su distrito, El ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para dar mantenimiento a su vehículo comprando un repuesto y de esta manera seguir trabajando seguro y al mismo tiempo generando ingresos para sostener a su familia.
texts.en:
Wilder is 31 years old. He lives together with his mother in the district of Cayaltí, two hours from the city of Chiclayo, on the North Coast of Peru. The people here grow sugarcane, raise small animals and work in transportation.

For the past three years Wilder has offered taxi services, taking people to the neighboring communities in his district. He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1000 PEN to maintain his taxi and buy a replacement part. In this way he can continue to work safely and generate revenue to support his family.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle which he uses to work.

loans.name: Lucy Anabel

texts.es:
Lucy Anabel tiene 25 años de estado, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en el distrito de Buenos Aires, su población se dedica al cultivo de frutales y ganadería como fuente de ingreso principal que pertenece a Morropon, a dos horas de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica al comercio de plátano de la isla, su pequeño negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, nos explica que se dedica a esta actividad para apoyar con los gastos de su hogar, son una familia que se esfuerza por tener un mejor futuro.

Lucy ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para comprar diversas frutas para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera ofrecer alternativas a sus clientes, lo que le generaran mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Lucy Anabel is 25 years old and lives with her husband and their children in the district of Buenos Aires, where the population grows fruit and raises livestock as the main source of income.  Buenos Aires is in Morropon, which is two hours from Piura on the north coast of Peru.

She sells bananas and her small shop is located in her home.  She tells us that she began doing this work in order to help pay her household expenses.  Her family works hard to have a better future.

Lucy is seeking a loan of 1500 nuevos soles so that she can buy a variety of seasonal fruit to sell via her business.  She wants to offer her customers a greater selection so that she can generate a higher income for her family.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits for her business.

loans.name: Pedro Martin

texts.es:
Pedro Martin tiene 49 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijo en el distrito de Buenos Aires, una comunidad donde su población se dedica al cultivo de frutas y ganadería fuente principal de ingreso, a dos horas de la ciudad de Morropon, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su familia se dedican al comercio de granos, plátanos, adicionalmente brinda el servicio de trasporte de carga en su vehículo a las comunidad es aledañas a su distrito.

El ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para darle mantenimiento su finca y de plátanos y de esta manera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro Martin is 49 years old. He lives with his wife and son in the district of Buenos Aires, which is two hours from Morropon on Peru's North Coast. The people here grow fruit and raise livestock.

Pedro Martin along with his family grow grains and bananas. He also provides cargo transport services with his vehicle to the other communities in his district.

Pedro Martin has requested a loan of 3,000 PEN to do maintenance on his banana plantation. Doing this he will have more product to offer his clients generating more income for his family.

loans.use: to do maintenance on his banana plantation.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.en:
This is Soledad, 57, a resident of Cabrera, Pasay, Philippines. She is married to Alberto, also a vendor. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.

Soledad operates a street vending business. She sells cigarettes and candies. She also sells balut, a fertilized three-week-old chicken or duck egg, with an embryo in it. Her regular customers are neighbors, passersby and the local community. She earns a minimum of 300 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 32,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more quantities and varieties of products to expand her product inventory.

Soledad dreams of having an additional stall and hopes that her children will finish their education. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for candies and cigarettes needed in her business.

loans.name: Sreymom

texts.en:
Sreymom is 28 years old and is married. She resides with a two-year-old child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than three years, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband is also a garment worker, who makes an income of $4 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Sreymom is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase rice seeds, fertilizer and fuel to use for cultivating in the dry season. By doing so, she would be able to generate more income to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her farming business and send her child to a good school. Moreover, she plans to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds, fertilizer and fuel

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru:
Гулбахор 39 летняя скромная и деятельная женщина, которая проживает в районе Яван. Она работает в школе учительницей и одновременно является членом дехканского хозяйства. Дехканское хозяйство это небольшое индивидуальное или коллективное частное хозяйство, в котором работают несколько людей и где в основном выращивают хлопок, пшеницу или овощи - которые занимают 60% орошаемых земель в Таджикистане. 
В дехканском хозяйстве Гулбахор работает вот уже 6 лет. Она в основном выращивает огородные и зерновые культуры.
Семейная жизнь Гулбахор не сложилась. Она разведена, не имеет детей и живет одна. Поэтому она все свое время посвящает школе и работе на земле. В данный момент Гулбахор свой участок земли готовит к посеву. Она просит кредит, чтобы приобрести семена, минеральные удобрения и топливо. Гулбахор планирует потратить полученную прибыль на внутренний ремонт своего новопостроенного дома.
texts.en:
Gulbahor is a humble, active 39-year-old woman who lives in Yavan. She works as a school teacher and is also a member of a collective farm. A collective farm is a small farm, owned by an individual or group, which employs several people. Most of these farms grow cotton, wheat, and vegetables. They account for 60% of the irrigated land in Tajikistan. 

Gulbahor has been working on the farm for six years. She grows mainly vegetables and grain. Gulbahor's family life has not come together. She is divorced, has no children, and lives alone. So, she devotes all her time to school and farm work. Currently Gulbahor's plot of land is ready for sowing. She is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, and fuel. Gulbahor plans to spend any money she makes on finishing the inside of her newly built home.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizers and fuel, so she can make enough money to renovate her home.

loans.name: Nuestra Señora De Guadalupe Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal nuestra señora de Guadalupe está conformado por nueve integrantes, madres responsables de sus hijos. Originarias del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte del país. El sauce se caracteriza por ser una zona productora de leche, queso, crema. Estas mujeres son personas  emprendedoras, trabajadoras, con ganas de superación personal. Lamentablemente no pudieron  estudiar, para trabajar desde muy joven y ayudar con los gastos del hogar.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora del banco es  Segunda y tiene por actividad económica la venta de cuajada en su casa de habitación y de forma ambulante. La rutina de trabajo de esta mujer es levantarse desde muy temprana a preparar su venta, la cual desempeña de forma ambulante alrededor de unas 8 horas diarias. El objetivo del crédito es compra mas materia prima para elaborar la cuajada como leche, cuajo. Para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. El banco comunal Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The communal bank Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe (Our Lady of Guadalupe) is made up of nine members, mothers who are caring for their children. They are from Sauce which is located in the northern part of the country and is known for its production of milk, cheese and cream.  These are hard-working, enterprising women with a strong desire for personal advancement. Unfortunately, they could not go to school and have been working since they were very young to help with household expenses.

Thanks to her efforts and desire to get ahead, Segunda is the bank coordinator. She earns her livelihood by selling curd from her house and also door-to-door. This woman's work routine is to get up very early to prepare for her sales, and then she spends about eight hours each day selling door-to-door. The purpose of the loan is to buy more ingredients for making curd, such as milk and rennet so that in the not-too-distant future she will have a better income. The communal bank Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe is grateful for the help that Kiva investors offer to people of limited resources and poor countries like Nicaragua so that they might have a dignified way to earn a living.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and stock her business by buying ingredients for making curd, such as milk and rennet.

loans.name: Tomordavaa

texts.en:
Mr.Tomordavaa is 38 and lives with his wife and son in a Ger, a traditional nomadic tent, in Uvs province, Mongolia. His wife is a local school teacher and his son goes to a local kindergarten.

Tomordavaa has been providing taxi service and transportation service business in town for last 5 years. He is a good and careful driver with a good reputation among residents. He is now planning to replace the winter tires for his truck. He is now requesting loan of 1,000,000MNT to purchase 4 winter tires for his truck to secure safety.

loans.use: to purchase 4 winter tires for his truck to secure safety

loans.name: Eloy

texts.es:
Eloy tiene 49 años de edad, vive junto a su anciano padre en la zona rural de Cayalti, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, arroz como fuente principal de ingreso, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Desde hace 5 años se dedica al servicio de transporte público en su mototaxi, trasladando a sus pasajeros a las comunidades más cercanas a su distrito, Eloy ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para darle mantenimiento a su vehículo y brindar un servicio seguro a sus clientes y de esta manera seguir generando ingresos para sostener a su familia.
texts.en:
Eloy is 49 years old. He lives with his elderly father in the district of Cayalti, two hours from the city of Chiclayo, on the North Coast of Perú. The people here grow sugarcane and rice as their main sources of income.

For the past five years Eloy has offered transportation with his motor-taxi, taking passengers to the closer communities in his district. Eloy has requested a loan of 1,000 PEN to do maintenance on his vehicle so he can continue to offer safe services to his clients and make the money he needs to support his family.

loans.use: to maintain the vehicle he uses for work.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
Linda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a internet cafe business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy an additional unit and spare parts for her business.

Linda has been in this business for 2 years. Linda earns additional income from buying and selling charcoal and firewood.

Linda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional unit and spare parts for her business

loans.name: Akmaljon

texts.ru: Акмалчон позитивный и ответственный мужчина в возрасте 40 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Он живёт со своей семьёй в небольшом посёлке. Но дом, в котором они живут, маловат и не совсем  благоустроен для хорошего проживания в нём. Жена Акмалчона очень трудолюбивая женщина и заботливая мама. Сам Акмалчон занимается купля продажей автомобилей, а его жена имеет небольшой швейный цех на местном рынке. Этим самым они зарабатывают на проживание. Этого дохода, который они совместно получают хватает лишь на проживание. Но у них есть мечта построить большой дом для своей семьи. Но для этого им необходимы денежные средства. Того, что они зарабатывают не достаточно, чтобы позволить себе построение нового дома. Поэтому Акмалчон обратился в Арванд и  хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для построения дома. Акмалчон и его жена надеются на положительный результат и заранее благодарят Арванд  за поддержку.
texts.en: Akmaljon is a positive and responsible forty-year-old man. He is married and has three children. He lives with his family in a small village. However, the house in which they live is too small and poorly built. Akmaljon's wife is a very hardworking woman and caring mother. Akmaljon  works buying and selling cars, and his wife has a small sewing shop in the local market. This is how they earn their living. The money they make is just enough to live. But they dream of building a large house for their family. But to do that, they need the money. The fact is, they do not earn enough to build a new home. Therefore, Akmaljon has asked Arvand for a loan to buy building materials to build a house. Akmaljon and his wife are hoping for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: buy building materials

loans.name: Gufronkhon

texts.ru: Гуфронхон доброжелательный и ответственный парень в возрасте 26 лет. Он женат и имеет одного ребёнка. Он живёт со своей семьёй в небольшом посёлке. Но дом, в котором они живут, маловат и не совсем  благоустроен для хорошего проживания в нём. Жена Гуфронхона домохозяйка, она очень трудолюбивая и заботливая мама. Сам Гуфронхон работает поваром в одной из местных столовых. В этой столовой он работает недавно и получает среднюю заработную плату. Этого дохода хватает Гуфронхону только на пропитание. Но у него есть мечта, Гуфронхон хочет отремонтировать свой дом, чтобы в нём было приятно жить. Но для этого ему необходимы денежные средства. То, что он зарабатывает не достаточно, чтобы позволить себе  ремонт своего дома. Поэтому Гуфронхон обратился в Арванд и  хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта своего дома. Он надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд  за поддержку.
texts.en: Gufronkhon is a friendly and responsible 26 year old. He is married and has one child. He lives with his family in a small village. But the house in which they live is too small and not well built. Gufronkhon's wife is a housewife, a very hardworking and caring mother. Gufronkhon works as a cook in a local cafeteria. He hasn't worked there long and earns an average wage. This salary is only enough for Gufronkhon to pay for food. However, he has a dream. Gufronkhon wants to renovate his house so it will be pleasant to live in. But for this he needs money. The fact is he does not earn enough to repair his home. Therefore, Gufronkhon turned to Arvand for a loan to buy construction materials to repair his home. He hopes for a positive outcome, and thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: buy building materials

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
Mirian, soltera de 28 años, nacida en Santa Cruz de la Sierra – Bolivia se encuentra cursando el programa Experto en Negocios Internacionales y Exportaciones en la Escuela Europea de Negocios, para lo cual desea acceder a un crédito de EDUCA-PRÓ para terminar de financiar sus Estudios.

Mirian actualmente trabaja como Asistente de Comercio Exterior en el Banco Unión. Precisamente por motivos laborales y de estudios es que de lunes a viernes vive en la ciudad en casa de unos tíos; pero su familia y su hijo de 4 años viven en Portachuelo que es una localidad distante a unos 70 Km. de la ciudad, a donde regresa todos los fines de semana para estar con ellos, sobretodo con su pequeño que es quien la inspira para lograr sus metas y trabaja por él.

A Mirian le gusta mucho lo que estudia y le va muy bien, pero ha encontrado ciertos problemas para pagar sus estudios pues al ser madre soltera y sus padres de escasos recursos económicos no cuenta con ingresos elevados. Al finalizar sus estudios piensa postularse a un cargo superior en el mismo banco y así contar con las posibilidades económicas para tener a su hijo viviendo con ella todos los días. 

Miriam, tiene sus esperanzas puestas en el financiamiento de sus estudios, afirmando que lo que la hace destacar de otros alumnos es que ella ya se encuentra trabajando en el área de la especialización que requiere, por lo que será un buen complemento para poner en práctica todos los nuevos conocimientos adquiridos. Ella piensa que su vida hubiera sido mucho más prometedora si no se le hubieran presentado obstáculos familiares como la separación de su pareja estando embarazada, o el derrame cerebral sufrido por su papá; y otros de índole económico que lucha por superar día a día, sin embargo el solo hecho de presentar sus papeles para acceder a un financiamiento la pone feliz y esperanzada, pues otras personas la estarían ayudando a cumplir con sus sueños y metas que se ha trazado en la vida. Agradece a Dios y a las personas que colaborarán con ella para permitirle desarrollarse profesionalmente.
texts.en:
Mirian, who is 28 years old and single, was born in Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Bolivia. She is part way through the Expert in International Business and Exports programme in the European Business School, and she wants to apply to EDUCA-PRO for a loan so she can finalise the financing of her studies.

Mirian currently works as an assistant in Foreign Commerce in the Banco Unión. For work and study reasons she lives at her uncle's in the city from Monday to Friday but her family and her 4 year old son live in Portachuelo which is 70km from the city. Each weekend she returns home to be with her family and especially with her little son who is her inspiration to achieve her goals and she works for him.

Mirian really enjoys what she is studying and it is going well for her, but she has had a few problems paying for her studies because she is a single mother and her parents have limited means so she does not have much of an income. When she finishes her studies she hopes to apply for a more senior position in the same bank and so have the finances to make it possible to have her son living with her all the time.

Mirian firmly hopes she will get the finance for her studies and says that what makes her stand out from the other students is that she is already working in her preferred area of specialisation and this will be a good complement so she can put into practice all of her newly acquired knowledge. She thinks her life would have been much more promising if she had not had family obstacles such as the separation from her partner when she was expecting, or the stroke which her father suffered, and other problems of an economic nature which she has to fight to overcome every day. However, the mere act of submitting her paperwork to apply for a loan makes her happy and optimistic, since other people would be helping her to fulfil the dreams and goals which she has set out in life. She thanks God and the people who are supporting her to allow her to have professional development.

loans.use: to continue her studies in the Expert in International Business and Exports programme.

loans.name: Ahmed Abdiqadir

texts.en: Ahmed Abdiqadir is 23 years old. He is a senior at the Student University of Hargeisa , faculty of Economics . He needs a laptop to write his thesis and he cannot pay the money all at one time. His good news was when he found the Kaaba-Kiva laptop loan. He approached Kaaba MFI and then Kaaba will provide him with a laptop that he can pay for in installments.  After the university, Ahmed hopes to start an online Masters degree.

loans.use: To buy a laptop for education purposes.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Sara tiene 29 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo en la zona rural de Oyotun, su población se dedica al cultivo de algodón, maíz, yuca, comercio en general y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su familia se dedican a la venta de combustible, siendo los únicos en la zona que abastecen a sus clientes, su esposo se dedica a las labores agrícolas.

Ella ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para invertirlo en la compra de más combustible, ya que la demanda está en aumento, y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para la familia.
texts.en:
Sara is 29 years old and lives with her son in the rural zone of Oyotun where the people earn their living from growing cotton, corn, and yuca, general business, and livestock. It is two hours from the city of Chiclayo, on the northern coast of Peru.

Together with her family they earn their livelihood from selling fuel and are the only ones in the area who supply their customers.  Her husband works in agriculture. Sara has asked for a loan of 1,000 Nuevos Soles to invest in the purchase of more fuel because demand is increasing, and if she sells more, she will generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy fuel to stock her business.

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.es:
Jacinto tiene 59 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Cañaris es una zona rural, donde su población se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, a tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Con la ayuda de su esposa se dedican a la cría de animales menores ovejas y cerdos en la parte posterior a su domicilio, El ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para comprar pavos y gallinas para posteriormente engordarlos y ofrecerlos a un mejor precio a sus clientes a en mercado de la zona y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Jacinto is 59 years old. He lives with his wife in the Cañaris district, which is a rural zone whose residents work in agriculture and raise cattle. It is three hours from the city of Chiclayo on Perú's northern coast.

With the help of his wife, he makes a living by raising small animals like sheep and pigs in the backyard of his home. He has requested a loan of 500 nuevos soles to purchase turkeys and chickens to fatten them and offer them for a better price to his customers at the market. This way, he will bring home more income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase turkeys and chickens to supply his business.

loans.name: Lucelina

texts.es:
Lucelina tiene 45 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, en una comunidad que se caracteriza por el cultivo de maíz, yuca y arroz, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores, su negocio se encuentra en la parte posterior de su domicilio, Lucelina es una madre emprendedora ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para comprar gallinas y cuyes para ofrecerlos en los caseríos aledaños a su comunidad y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Lucelina is 45 years old. She lives with her children in the Oyotún district, in a community whose residents primarily grow maíz, yuca, and rice. It is locates two hours from the city of Chiclayo on Perú's northern coast.

She makes a living by raising and selling small animals. Her business is located in the back part of her home.

Lucelina is an entrepreneurial mother and has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 500 nuevos soles to purchase chickens and guinea pigs. She will sell them to the neighboring villages in the community and generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and guinea pigs for her business.

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 63 años de edad vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Cayaltí, donde su población se dedica al cultivo de caña y comercio de animales menores, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Su familia se dedican a la crianza y venta de animales menores en el mercado de la zona, son una familia emprendedora muy conocida por la labor que realizan, Segundo ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para comprar animales menores patos, cuyes, pavos y una segunda parte para alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera abastecer su negocio ofreciendo a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Segundo is 63 years old. He lives with his family in the Cayaltí district, whose residents make a living by growing sugar cane and selling small animals. It is about two hours from the city of Chiclayo on Perú's northern coast.

His family makes a living by raising and selling small animals in the market in their area. They are an entrepreneurial family and are well-known for the work that they do.

Segundo has requested a loan for 3,000 nuevos soles to purchase small animals (ducks, guinea pigs, and turkeys) and to purchase balanced animal feed to fatten his animals. This way, he will be able to stock his business with the things he will sell to his customers.

loans.use: to purchase small animals and balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Zacarias

texts.es:
Zacarías tiene 66 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de La Matanza, caracterizada por sus bosques de algarrobo, cultivos de fruta y comercio de animales menores, que pertenece a Morropon, a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Con la ayudad de su esposa se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores, cerdos, gallinas, pavos, su negocio está ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, Zacarías ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 500 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra chivos y cerdos para posteriormente engordarlos y ofrecerlo en los caseríos aledaños a su comunidad y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Zacarías is 66 years old. He lives with his wife in the La Matanza district, whose residents make a living with their carob tree forests, fruit harvests, and the sale of small animals. It is located in Morropon, which is two hours from the city of Piura on the northern coast of Perú.

With the help of his wife, he makes a living by raising and selling small animals like pigs, chickens, and ducks. His business is located behind his home.

Zacarías has requested a loan of 3,500 nuevos soles to invest in the purchase of goats and pigs, which he will later fatten and sell in the neighboring villages in his community. This way, he will generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase goats and pigs to stock his business.

loans.name: Muminjon

texts.ru: Муминджон жизнерадостный и активный парень. Он женат и имеет двух детей. Живёт он со своей семьёй в небольшом посёлке. Чтобы зарабатывать на проживание Муминджон занимается предпринимательской деятельностью. У него имеется собственная фото студия, где он и работает. Сам он работает фотографом в этой студии и является директором. Этому делу он научился с юных лет, у него было желание фотографировать природу и людей. Также эта профессия для него является потомственной, так как его дед и отец тоже были фотографами. В своей фото студии Муминджон также предоставляет компьютерные услуги населению. Сейчас ему необходимо приобрести некоторую новую технику для улучшения качества предоставляемых услуг. Поэтому Муминджон обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит, чтобы закупить новую компьютерную  технику для своего бизнеса. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Muminjon is a cheerful and active guy. He is married and has two children. He lives with his family in a small village. To earn a living Muminjon conducts business. He has a private photo studio where he works. He works as a photographer and director in the studio. He learned this skill from a young age. He always wanted to photograph nature and people. Also, this profession runs in the family: his father and grandfather were also photographers. In his photo studio Muminjon also provides computer services to the public. Now he needs to buy some new equipment to improve the quality of services he provides. Therefore Muminjon has asked Arvand for a loan to buy new computer equipment for his business. He thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: buy computer equipment

loans.name: Aasma

texts.en:
Aasma is a 26-year-old hard working housewife. She is living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her husband.  Her husband is a security guard by profession, but his monthly income is not enough to cover the household expenses of his family. Therefore, for the past four years, along with being a security guard, he has also driven a taxi at night.  However, he is currently not able to generate any income from the taxi, as its engine is not working properly and needs to be repaired. 

Aasma has requested a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan to cover the amount required for repairing the engine of her husband's taxi. With the profit, her husband wants to open a new auto mechanic shop in the future.

Aasma desires to provide quality education to her all children, and she prays for the good health of her family and for the growth of her husband's business. She is very thankful to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to pay for the repair of her husband's taxi.

loans.name: Sarafina Group

texts.en:
Jamila, who is in her early 20s, is married with two children, one in school. The other is a baby. For two years now, Jamila has been running several businesses, like selling clothes and food. She works from 6.00 a.m .to 7.00 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Jamila's third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to start selling food like chapati, mandazi and vitumbua. She also increased on the stock of clothes and managed to sell to more people. She sells door to door and really appreciated the loan. The loan has managed her to make her life secure. She is happy with the loan and gives thanks to whoever has helped her group to get this loan  She has successfully paid back all her loans. She used the profit to pay school fees, bought a cupboard for storing her clothes and covered household expenses. She will use this loan to buy more clothes, baking flour, cooking oil, 5 kilos of rice and charcoal.  She dreams of building her own house.

Jamila will share this loan with her loan group "SARAFINA" which has four members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes, baking flour, cooking oil, 5 kilos of rice and charcoal.

loans.name: Tulsinoy

texts.ru: Тулсиной вместе со своей семьей живет в отдаленном регионе. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Тулсиной одна справляется с домохозяйством, воспитанием детей и введением бизнеса. Она более 5 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур как рис, кукуруза и пшеница. Она имеет свою землю. Тулсиной имеет дополнительный доход от скотоводства. Она выращивает 5 голов крупно – рогатого скота. Тулсиною помогают ее дети по введению бизнеса. Она должна сделать осенний посев, но она не имеет денег для покупки семена, минерального удобрения и топлива. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7500 сомони. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Tulsinoy lives with her family in a remote region. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation. On her own, Tulsinoy deals with the household, raising the children, and running a business. For more than five years, she has been engaged in raising crops such as rice, corn and wheat. She has her own land. Tulsinoy has additional income from raising cattle. She is raising five head of cattle. Tulsinoy's children help her in running the business.
